page.title: 13Newsheet For N. Lopham
page.content:
The Lophams' News is a monthly newsheet for North and South Lopham. Its aim is to give publicity and information about events that are important to the two villages. In the Lophams' News for July 1985 we found several items about North Lopham. First, it mentioned St.Andrew's School Fair - proceeds will go to school fund. This fund helps pay for school items and sponsors the education of Raja an Indian boy.
Also mentioned was the North Lopham lane walk, to help keep footpaths open, as many are closed off by farmers these days. St. Andrew's school are leading the walk. The North Lopham Village sign is also mentioned. It will soon be erected by the pond. We do not yet know what will be on the sign.
